name: JLCustomPagingView
summary: JLCustomPagingView presenting diferent views and view controller on diferent way.
description:
This is a library created to help all developers that do not want to use the scrollView or the PageViewController to present diferent views and viewcontrollers and do not want to waste precious time creating his own.Simple to implement and understand
JLCustomPagingView will help you to improve your time.
